roleset_name: to preside over as a chairperson with another

roles.descr: Focus, first or plural mention of person/s serving as chair
roles.descr_trans: 重点、首次或复数提及担任主席的人员

roles.descr: Second chairperson when separate mention, arg0 chairs with whom?
roles.descr_trans: 第二位主席单独提的时候，arg0 和谁一起主持？

roleset_name_trans: 与另一人共同担任主席
